channel.title: How to change exp rates? :)

item.title: How to change exp rates? :)
item.dc:creator: @Alex13 -Alex-
item.description:
@Alex13 wrote:

[quote=“niji87, post:1, topic:477265”]OK so, I have fixed every problem I’ve had except the exp rates… I think I am changing them in the right file but when after I compile the exp rates are still the same.
This is in the player.java server settings… the x20 for combat was 75 instead of 20 and the x15 for skills was 50 instead of 15. Lol did I change the exp rates correctly? Any help is greatly appreciated.
public static final int XP_RATE = 1; // x20 for combat, x15 for skills
public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 1;
public static final int COMBAT_XP_RATE = 1;
public static final int AIR_GUITAR_MUSICS_COUNT = 50;[/quote]
Did you change where the bold is? If so, that’s not going to change it. Change it where it says SKILLING_EXP_RATE = 1 and COMBAT_XP_RATE = 1, and let us know.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change exp rates? :)

item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Open Settings.java and search “XP_RATE”. (718)

This is in the player.java server settings… the x20 for combat was 75 instead of 20 and the x15 for skills was 50 instead of 15. Lol did I change the exp rates correctly? Any help is greatly appreciated.

public static final int COMBAT_XP_RATE = 1;
